i have overwatch beta screenshots on my steam screenshots library and to think ive stuck with this game for this many years feels like i've been robbed. idc about the PvE and it's lies but i care more about the base game. WE HAD TO LIVE WITH GOATS FOR 4 YEARS!!!! WE HAD TO DEAL WITH DOUBLE SHIELD META FOR 2 YEARS BEFORE THE GAME GOT "REBRANDED" INTO 5V5!!!!!! WE. ARE. TRAUMATIZED.

that being said the devs DO NOT CARE ABOUT THE GAME and have NO IDEA WHAT THEY'RE DOING. Jeff Kaplan did his best with what awful management they have

> Be Blizzard
> 2019
> Announce OW2
> Huge PvE experience with an overhauled PvP update also
> Fanbase creams at the idea
> Radio silence for 3 fucking years
> Release OW2
> No PvE
> Ruined game balance

> Controversial switch to 5v5
> But there's hope
